casebody.data:
HOME BUILDERS
v.
CITY OF FAYETTEVILLE. No. 343P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 19, 2005. Karen McDonald, City Attorney, for Fayetteville.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of July 2004 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"The Stay issued on the 12th of July, 2004 is Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of August 2005."
